data.title: Annie Martell Denver: The life story of John Denver's ex-wife
data.meta_description: ANNIE MARTELL DENVER is renowned for her status as John Denver's ex-wife. Get to know juicy details about her family, career, and personal life in this post.
data.text:
A lot of celebrity marriages end in divorce. Most of the celebrity exes stay in the spotlight, but some completely disappear from the limelight. Annie Martell Denver is one of the celebrity exes who fit in the latter category. She has led a notoriously private life since she divorced her celebrity husband.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Annie Martell Denver profile summary

Who is Annie Martell Denver?

Is Annie Martell Denver married?

Did John Denver have any children?

How much is Annie Martell's net worth?

Quick facts about Annie Martell Denver

John Denver, the ex-husband of Annie Martell, is a famous singer and songwriter. He came to the limelight in 1960 and quickly rose through the ranks of his career to become one of the most popular acoustic artists in the 1970s. John was one of the best-selling musical artists and performers in the 1970s. Unfortunately, he died in an aeroplane crash in October 1997.

Annie Martell Denver profile summary

Full names: Annie Martell Denver

Date of birth: September 6, 1946

Age: 76 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Minnesota, USA

Zodiac sign: Virgos

Gender: Female

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Religion: Christian

Sexual orientation: Straight

Parents: Jim Martell and Norma Martell

Siblings: Linda Nelson, Teri Martell, and Ben Martell

Marital status: Divorced

Children: Anna Kate Denver and Zachary John Denver

Famous as: John Denver's ex-wife

Who is Annie Martell Denver?

Annie was born on September 6, 1946, in Minnesota, USA. She is 76 years old as of 2022. The names of her parents are Jim Martell and Norma Martell.

She grew up alongside her three siblings, Linda Nelson, Teri Martell, and Ben Martell. After graduating from high school, she enrolled in Aldophus College, located in St Peter, Minnesota.

Is Annie Martell Denver married?

Annie is a famous celebrity spouse, thanks to her marriage to John Denver. She met John in 1966 during a concert in Minnesota. They dated for a few months and exchanged their marriage vows in 1967. They lived together happily for several years. One of Denver's songs titled Annie's Song, which topped the musical charts in 1974, was written for her.

Unfortunately, their marriage did not have a happily ever after ending as they divorced in 1982. Career demands were cited as one of the reasons that drove the duo apart. Has Annie Denver remarried? It is not clear if she remarried or not. After she divorced John, she opted to live a low-key life, and there are no details about her love life in the limelight.

Did John Denver have any children?

Unfortunately, Annie and John were not blessed with any biological children. After struggling to have a biological child, they adopted two kids. The names of their adopted children are Anna Kate Denver and Zachary John Denver. Zachary was born on May 23, 1974, and he is 48 years old as of 2022.

Anna was reportedly born in 1976, and she is 46 years old as of 2022. John only has one biological daughter named Jesse Belle from her marriage to actress Cassandra Delaney. She was born on May 18, 1989, and she is 33 years old as of 2022. His children have chosen a different career path. They are all married and living with their families.

How much is Annie Martell's net worth?

Details about Annie's net worth are not in the limelight. She allegedly received a significant sum as divorce settlement from John Denver, but she has remained tight-lipped on the matter.

Her ex-husband had a net worth of $60 million when he died in 1997. He amassed a fortune from his successful music and acting career.

Quick facts about Annie Martell Denver

Where does Annie Martell live today? She is currently living in Aspen, Colorado.

What is Annie Martell famous for? She is famous as the ex-wife of the late American singer and songwriter John Denver.

How old is Annie Martell? She was born on September 6, 1946, and she is 76 years old as of 2022.

Where is Annie Martell from? Her birthplace is in Minnesota, USA.

Does Annie Martell have any kids? She is a proud mother of two adopted children, Anna Kate Denver and Zachary John Denver.

Who are Annie Martell Denver's parents? The name of his father is Jim Martell, while that of his mother is Norma Martell.

Who got John Denver's money? Annie was named the administrator of his estate, and she divided his assets among his three children.

Annie Martell Denver became a household name in the entertainment industry thanks to her status as the wife of the famous American singer John Denver. It is more than two decades since she parted ways with John, but her fame is yet to die down.

Tuko.co.ke published an article about Marta Fitzgerald, the ex-wife of Rush Limbaugh. Rush is a famous late American radio presenter, television host, political analyst, and aerobic instructor. Marta Fitzgerald was born on December 10th, 1960, in Titusville, Florida, and she is 61 years old as of 2021.

Marta got married to Rush Limbaugh as his third wife. The ex-couple met on the online service CompuServe in 1990. They married at the U.S. Supreme Court on May 27th, 1994. Her ex-husband has been married a record four times. They were married for 10 years, but this one too ended in a divorce like the previous marriages.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
